snippet: Tomás Saraceno’s futuristic modular habitat of reflective stainless steel and acrylic opens Tuesday on the rooftop garden of the Metropolitan Museum of Art for a nearly six-month exhibition.
abstract: Installation of Tomas Saraceno's 20-ton sculpture Cloud City on the roof of the Metropolitan Museum of Art is nearly complete.
lead_paragraph: Tomás Saraceno’s futuristic modular habitat of reflective stainless steel and acrylic opens Tuesday on the rooftop garden of the Metropolitan Museum of Art for a nearly six-month exhibition.

headline.seo: Tomás Saraceno’s ‘Cloud City’ on Roof at Metropolitan Museum
headline.main: Futuristic Aerie With a Park View
headline.print_headline: Futuristic Aerie With a Park View
